SEARCH
Package org.jlab.icalibrate.epics

Interface PvListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
CreateNewDatasetWorker
public interface PvListener
A contract for classes interested in notifications from an EPICS channel monitor.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    notifyPvInfo(String pv, boolean couldConnect, DBRType type, Integer count, String[] enumLabels)
    Notification of PV metadata sent after registering a PV with a ChannelMonitor.
    void
    notifyPvUpdate(String pv, DBR dbr)
    Notification of PV value change.

  • Method Details

    • notifyPvInfo

      void notifyPvInfo(String pv, boolean couldConnect, DBRType type, Integer count, String[] enumLabels)
      Notification of PV metadata sent after registering a PV with a ChannelMonitor.
      Parameters:
      pv - The PV that was registered
      couldConnect - true if the channel connected, false otherwise
      type - The EPICS datatype of the channel
      count - The EPICS item count
      enumLabels - labels for the EPICS enumeration state if datatype is ENUM, null otherwise

    • notifyPvUpdate

      void notifyPvUpdate(String pv, DBR dbr)
      Notification of PV value change.
      Parameters:
      pv - The PV
      dbr - The EPICS DataBaseRecord
